[vc_section][vc_row el_class=”col-md-10 col-md-offset-1 pad-t2 pad-b2″][vc_column][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”col-md-10 col-md-offset-1″]

Start Your Career with Jet Plumbing Today

Jet Plumbing consistently and progressively looks for trained and untrained individuals to help with the thousands of service calls we complete each year.

We have 4 departments (plumbing, drain cleaning, & underground services) that together are comprised of over 30 dedicated individuals that enjoy the opportunity of working and learning in these ever-changing fields. While also having the opportunity to make a good living for themselves and their families.

We are always looking for field trained plumbing technicians. And at times we have the availability to hire those motivated to learn these trades with on-the-job training positions.

If you feel you would be a good fit and enjoy a career doing this type of work, we would love for you to come by our office and drop off an application or resume.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1569951813048{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

SEE OUR OPEN POSITIONS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
